item.description:
Recreate is defined as to give new life or freshness to. We'll be delving on this word for this month's topic, focusing on what we do to have us come to a place of liveliness and recreation. Appropiately so, bring your own cocktails to our conversations at MiniLuxe at the Hingham Derby Shops. The manager Bridgette has invited us to enjoy the space for our conversations, and those interested, for a complimentary manicure (and that goes for the gentlemen too :).

In line with recreating, how do we recreate our selves and what version of our selves needs recreation? Shakespeare's famous words spoken by Polonius to his son Laertes in Act I of Hamlet "This above all: to thine own self be true, and it must follow, as the night the day, thou canst not then be false to any man". Which of our "selves" are we to stay true?

For those interested in a complimentary manicure, please say so under comments when you RSVP. Tentatively:
6:00 - 6:20 pm : Meet & Greet
6:20 - 7:45 pm: Cocktails & Conversations
7:45 - 8:30: Continue Conversations, Complimentary Manicure
item.name: Recreate
